backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining file handling, user profiles, activity events, authorization checks, and session storage with various utility types.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old state to the new actor state by adding an empty activityEvents map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of frontend file summaries describing roles of journey components, audio system, effects, tracking, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app and containing metadata, manifest link, and a hidden message.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, colors, start URL, and icon for installation.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing basic static asset caching and fetch fallback behavior.
frontend/src/admin/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing local and backend activity events with visitor filtering and JSON export.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders an admin login form with password input, error handling, and submit logic calling an onLogin callback.
frontend/src/admin/AdminRouter.tsx: Routes between the admin login page and dashboard based on authentication state from useAdminAuth.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminAuth.ts: Implements session-based admin authentication with a hardcoded password and automatic timeout tracking.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing providers, service worker registration, music system, and router.
frontend/src/audio/MusicController.tsx: UI component for controlling music playback, volume, and expansion state using the music system hook.
frontend/src/audio/MusicProvider.tsx: Provides global music playback context with autoplay handling, track switching, volume control, and user-interaction fallbacks.
frontend/src/audio/playlist.ts: Defines available audio tracks and exports their file paths and TrackKey type.
frontend/src/audio/useMusicSystem.ts: Hook exposing simplified controls for playback, track changes, and volume via the music context.
frontend/src/celebration/CelebrationPage: Displays the celebration screen with animated effects and sets the music to the celebration track.
frontend/src/easter-eggs/useEasterEggs.t: Adds Konami code detection, idle reminders, return notifications, and unload prompts using toast messages.
frontend/src/effects/HeartParticles.tsx: Canvas-based animated floating heart particles with adjustable intensity.
frontend/src/effects/RosePetals.tsx: Canvas animation rendering falling rose petals with configurable density and movement.
frontend/src/effects/StarsOverlay.tsx: Applies a twinkling starry background overlay with adjustable opacity levels.
frontend/src/effects/VignetteGlow.tsx: Renders a vignette-style glow overlay with variable intensity opacity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and status handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating activity data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining fonts, theme variables, animations, and utility styles.
frontend/src/journey/components/Progress: Displays a fixed progress bar showing the user's journey completion percentage.
frontend/src/journey/components/Question: Renders a question with selectable options and text inputs, logging submissions and sending answers upward.
frontend/src/journey/JourneyRenderer.tsx: Renders the current journey node with themed visuals, logs activity, and transitions state based on answers.
frontend/src/journey/JourneyRouter.tsx: Controls routing between landing, journey, celebration, and admin pages while managing journey state persistence.
frontend/src/journey/pages/LandingPage.t: Landing screen introducing the journey with animated visual effects and a start button.
frontend/src/journey/proposal/noButtonMe: Defines behavior for the 'No' button, changing its text, size, movement, and visibility based on attempt count.
frontend/src/journey/proposal/ProposalQu: Renders the main proposal screen with yes/think/no mechanics, logs decisions, and updates journey state including no-attempt behavior.
Implements a multi-step reflection flow where users enter answers, logs each step, and allows returning to the proposal.
Defines the full journey script with nodes, questions, options, metadata, and branching logic.
Declares the JourneyState interface tracking node ID, answers, progress, attempts, timings, and final decision.
frontend/src/journey/state/persistence.t: Provides localStorage save/load/clear helpers for persisting JourneyState.
frontend/src/journey/state/useAutosave.t: React hook that autosaves journey state on interval and on every state change.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/theme/sectionThemes.ts: Maps journey node IDs to themed UI settings including background, particle intensities, and music tracks.
frontend/src/tracking/backendQueue.ts: Implements a local event queue with retry logic, persistence, and filtering for backend submission.
frontend/src/tracking/journeyEventLogger: Logs journey events, records them locally, and enqueues them for backend submission with visitor metadata.
frontend/src/tracking/sendToBackend.ts: Flushes queued events to the backend actor with retry handling and exposes cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/tracking/storage.ts: Manages localStorage for tracking events and prepares combined export data including journey info and timestamps.
frontend/src/tracking/useActivityTracker: React hook that tracks basic click and mouse-move activity tied to the current journey node.
React hook that periodically flushes queued tracking events to the backend and handles unload-time syncing.
frontend/src/tracking/visitorId.ts: Generates and persists a unique anonymous visitor ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, existing tracking features, and pending activity-tracking requirements.
